newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks end flat as caution sets in before G7.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks end flat as caution sets in before G7.

text.p: Tokyo stocks ended flat in the Thursday session as most investors retreated to the sidelines ahead of the G7 summit which starts later this week, brokers said.
They added that bargain-hunting was particularly brisk, preventing the Nikkei average from falling too heavily.
The Nikkei 225 ended 10 points or 0.05 percent higher at 20,507.85. Its September futures slipped 140 points to finish the day at 20,440.

The TOPIX shed 1.17 points or 0.08 percent to end at 1,530.54. The Nikkei 300 lost 0.29 point or 0.10 percent to land at 295.80. The second section index finished at 1,838.98, down 1.94 points or 0.11 percent.
The over-the-counter index was up 4.61 points or 0.38 percent at 1,219.50 in late afternoon trade.
